name: Elden Run
description:
My third project for DATT2300-Game Development I at York University. Elden Run is a 2D endless runner platformer game. The goal of the game is to achieve higher scores. 

Control

        There is only one control in this game. Simply press the SPACE button to make the knight jump. 

Rules

        The knight only has one point of health, so you must dodge the bats and wolves to survive. Collect the rings to instantly increase your score/runes by 100. Collect the armor to protect you from being damaged by bats or wolves for once. Visually, you will see the armor icon on the top left corner and the colour of the knights' armor changes to gray while you are equipped with armor.  At the same time, make sure the knight isn't stopped by any obstacles, since once the chasing golem catches you, it will destroy you no matter what! 

Credit list:

- Sprites:

              1. The knight: https://aamatniekss.itch.io/fantasy-knight-free-pixelart-animated-character

              2. The bats & wolves: https://oco.itch.io/medieval-fantasy-character-pack

              3. The golem: https://hajileee.itch.io/hajileees-fantasy-characters-pack

              4. The background and levels: https://quintino-pixels.itch.io/wasteland-plataformer-tileset

              5. The collectible (rings) & the heart: https://aamatniekss.itch.io/game-collectable-pack-rotating

              6. The collectible (armors): https://kyrise.itch.io/kyrises-free-16x16-rpg-icon-pack

              7. UI & the font: https://paperhatlizard.itch.io/cryos-mini-gui

              8. Rings “particle” effect: https://nyknck.itch.io/pixel-art-effectfx036

- Music & Sound effects:

              5. Armor broken SE: https://elements.envato.com/sword-impact-on-metal-shield-Z96U7AT

              6. Death SE: https://elements.envato.com/swordsman-death-shout-VN674UA
